text: Va ʙa on kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista kardand, muƶda deh, ki dar oxirat ʙarojason ʙustonhoest va qasrhoi olimartaʙa va daraxtoni sojaafkan, ki zeri onho cujho cori mesavand. Va har goh az on co az mevahoi tunogun ruzi doda savand, gujand: «Pes az in dar dunjo az cunin mevahoe doda suda ʙudem va har vaqte ki az on mevaho casidand, ta'm va lazzati navero joftand, garcande ki in mevaho monand ʙa jakdigarand». Va niz dar on co hamsarone pokiza dorand va dar cannat namemirand va az on co ʙerun namesavand va on co covidona ʙosand
